descriptionHtml:
This is just a fun mod that I made
Info
This mod is not yet complete I am adding many more things like customers, quests and more drinks so stay tuned! :D
Guys version 4.0 has came out but I am not sure if this version works proberly send me a comment saying if it works or not. I have had so much fun with this mod!
installation

1. enter your skyrim data files

2. Copy all of the files into your data files

3. start game

This is very brief but I really couldn\'t be bothered to do the rest of
the installation guide

Mod by philanross


Where to find it
------------------

The Drinking Stall is just outside the Whiterun Stables. JUst look around for it and it will be there
if you need more help on finding the stall send me a comment or message on the nexus
you can find drunky at the main entrance of the solitude docks. 



The Drinks
-----------

The stall sells many drinks
including
The Special Stuff
MXR boosed
Happy Rainbows
Rum
Happy Ale
+ extra hidout added to drinking stall + Drunky and his little place :)
I cannot find spiced wine in the creation kit so It is not in the stall


Skooma and Moonsugar is in the stall
Hell yer :D!
author: philanross
